  tokenizer: "standard",
  filter: [
    {
      type: "condition",
      filter: ["lowercase"],
      script: {
        source: "token.getTerm().length() < 5",
      },
    },
  ],
  text: "THE QUICK BROWN FOX",
});
console.log(response);
